channel.title: Go on Notebook
channel.description: Recent content in Go on Notebook

item.description: Go Basics # Project template # Set up: mkdir example-project cd ./example-project go mod init ./.gitignore: ./Makefile: .PHONY: clean build test clean: echo "Not implemented" build: echo "Not implemented" test: echo "Not implemented" install: echo "Not implemented" ./main.go: package main import "fmt" func main() { fmt.Println("Hello, World!") } Run project: go run .
Installation # sudo apt update sudo apt upgrade -y sudo apt install golang -y Check version: go version
